title: The Vital link
creator_credit: M.J. Clark, W. J. Allen and Rank Audio Visual
brief_description: Examines the development of transport routes, how the preferred means of transport is usually a compromise between convenience, speed and cost and some of the problems caused by an ever increasing dependence on transport in our everyday lives.
